mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BO_TITLE, BO_CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATED_AT, BO_FILENAME1, BO_FILENAME2, BO_FILENAME3, BO_FILENAME4 ) VALUES ( #{BO_TITLE}, #{BO_CONTENT}, #{USER_ID}, SYSDATE, #{BO_FILENAME1} , #{BO_FILENAME2}, #{BO_FILENAME3}, #{BO_FILENAME4} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.BO_IDX, b.BO_TITLE, b.USER_ID, b.BO_CONTENT, b.BO_FILENAME1, b.BO_FILENAME2, b.BO_FILENAME3, b.BO_FILENAME4, b.CREATED_AT, b.USER_ID, b.BO_VIEWS, b.BO_LIKES, u.USER_NICK AS USER_NICK FROM TB_BOARD b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID= u.USER_ID ORDER BY b.BO_IDX DESC

SELECT b.BO_IDX, b.BO_TITLE, b.USER_ID, b.BO_CONTENT, b.BO_FILENAME1, b.BO_FILENAME2, b.BO_FILENAME3, b.BO_FILENAME4, b.CREATED_AT, b.USER_ID, b.BO_VIEWS, b.BO_LIKES, u.USER_NICK AS USER_NICK FROM TB_BOARD b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID= u.USER_ID WHERE BO_IDX = #{BO_IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET BO_VIEWS = BO_VIEWS + 1 WHERE BO_IDX = #{BO_IDX}
